mapper.select: SELECT reg_no, plate_num, guide_purchase_price, surplus_price, city, brand, `type`, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(license_day,'%Y%m%d'),DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'))/365 AS licenseDay, get_car_lon, get_car_lat, is_local FROM car WHERE reg_no = #{carPara} OR plate_num = #{carPara}

SELECT a.reg_no, a.guide_purchase_price, b.guid_price_begin, b.guid_price_end, b.insurance_value FROM (SELECT reg_no, guide_purchase_price FROM car WHERE reg_no = #{carPara} OR plate_num = #{carPara}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT guid_price_begin, guid_price_end, insurance_value FROM insurance_config) b ON (a.guide_purchase_price > b.guid_price_begin AND a.guide_purchase_price <= b.guid_price_end) OR (a.guide_purchase_price > b.guid_price_begin AND b.guid_price_end = -1)

SELECT a.reg_no,# 'carNo' b.deposit_type, b.deposit_value,# '押金金额' b.city_code, a.city, a.surplus_price,# '车辆残值' b.purchase_price_begin, b.purchase_price_end FROM (SELECT reg_no, surplus_price, city FROM car WHERE reg_no = #{carNo}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT deposit_type, purchase_price_begin, purchase_price_end, deposit_value, city_code FROM deposit_config WHERE deposit_type='1') b ON a.surplus_price >= b.purchase_price_begin AND a.surplus_price < b.purchase_price_end WHERE b.city_code = (SELECT IF ( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM deposit_config WHERE city_code = (SELECT city FROM car WHERE reg_no = #{carNo})) > 0, (SELECT city FROM car WHERE reg_no = #{carNo}), '0' ))

SELECT a.reg_no,# 'carNo' b.deposit_type, b.deposit_value,# '押金金额' b.city_code, a.city, a.surplus_price,# '车辆残值' b.purchase_price_begin, b.purchase_price_end FROM (SELECT reg_no, surplus_price, city FROM car WHERE reg_no = #{carNo}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT deposit_type, purchase_price_begin, purchase_price_end, deposit_value, city_code FROM deposit_config WHERE deposit_type='3') b ON a.surplus_price >= b.purchase_price_begin AND a.surplus_price < b.purchase_price_end WHERE b.city_code = '0'
